Lyric:
[00:38.598] I used to think that I could not go on
[00:44.399]And life was nothing but an awful song
[00:52.999]But now I know the meaning of true love
[01:00.599]I'm leaning on the everlasting arms
[01:09.199]If I can see it, then I can do it
[01:16.799]If I just believe it, there's nothing to it
[01:24.799]I believe I can fly
[01:28.799]I believe I can touch the sky
[01:32.499]I think about it every night and day
[01:35.799]Spread my wings and fly away
[01:40.799]I believe I can soar
[01:44.799]I see me running through that open door
[01:48.799]I believe I can fly
[01:52.799]I believe I can fly
[01:56.799]I believe I can fly
[02:06.099]See I was on the verge of breaking down
[02:11.397]Sometimes silence, it can seem so loud
[02:19.397]There are miracles in life I must achieve
[02:28.997]But first I know it starts inside of me
[02:37.897]If I can see it, then I can do it
[02:44.897]If I just believe it, there's nothing to it
[02:52.897]I believe I can fly
[02:56.897]I believe I can touch the sky
[03:00.197]I think about it every night and day
[03:04.197]Spread my wings and fly away
[03:08.197]I believe I can soar
[03:14.097]I see me running through that open door
[03:18.097]I believe I can fly
[03:21.097]I believe I can fly
[03:25.097]I believe I can fly

[03:49.497]If I just believe it, there's nothing to it
[03:56.497]I believe I can fly
